title: Delphi Study-Based Practical Course for Learning Design Pattern Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational design concepts and professional experience in social sector roles
context.additional_context: An environment enabling collaborative learning using digital devices and pattern-based design practice

learning_goals: Learners can classify and describe the components of learning design patterns (attributes, process groups)
Learners can derive context-appropriate learning design patterns for educational settings by applying the Delphi research methodology
Learners can develop a pattern language applicable to vocational education in social fields by integrating diverse expert feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
